name: R5-Extension-R4-Extension
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Extension into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `Extension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Extension`
R5 `Extension.extension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Extension.extension`
R5 `Extension.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Extension.id`

element.display: identifies the meaning of the extension

target.display: identifies the meaning of the extension
target.comment: R5 `Extension.url` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Extension.url`

R5 `Extension.value[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Extension.value[x]` - value[x] has change due to type change: R5 `value[x]` `integer64` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `value[x]`; value[x] has change due to type change: R5 value[x] CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 value[x]; value[x] has change due to type change: R5 value[x] RatioRange has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 value[x]; value[x] has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Availability has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 value[x]; value[x] has change due to type change: R5 value[x] ExtendedContactDetail has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 value[x]
